nodes.text: LEGO Star Wars Microfighters Obstacle Course
"LEGO Star Wars Microfighters Obstacle Source" is a short LEGO original video that features the line of Microfighters. It was uploaded on May 26, 2016.

At the Death Star, Darth Vader is taking a TIE pilot on an obstacle course in his TIE Advanced starfighter. The obstacle course involves dodging several heavy machinery and laser rays. Since the TIE pilot does not want to go first, Vader takes his TIE Advanced fighter on a demonstration run. Using the Force, Vader manages to dodge the heavy machinery and the laser rays. The TIE pilot then tries the obstacle course but quickly crashes his starfighter into a pillar. A message then appears on the screen "Should have used the Force...". The episode ends with Vader laughing at the TIE pilot.
